item.title: MOTIONREC launches October 27
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Puzzle action game dated.

Puzzle action game MOTIONREC will launch for PC via Steam on October 27, publisher PLAYISM and developer HANDSUM announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

MOTIONREC is a recording puzzle action game where you progress through stages by recording and playing back your own movements.

Rec, The Civilization-Recording Robot

MOTIONREC is a recording-based puzzle action game built around the concept of recording and playback. Use this ability to guide Rec, the civilization-recording robot, through a devastated world.

The Power of MOTIONREC

You can record the trajectory of your movements, from walking to jumping. Use stage gimmicks to create and record more complex movements to traverse the world.

Record your movements…

…and play them back in another location!

This will let you reach places too high to jump up to, or even access spots where there’s nothing to stand on. You can only play back your movements a certain number of times midair, however, and this is refreshed every time you land on the ground.

Make good use of the MOTIONREC ability to unravel the mysteries behind this devastated world ruled by machines!

Staff

  • Studio: HANDSUM inc.
  • Pixel Art: m7kenji
  • Music: Kyohei Fujita
  • Developer: shoma

item.title: YOBARAI Detective: Miasma Breaker coming to Switch 2 this fall in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Playable at Zentame from October 18 to 19.

Mebius will release every-direction action shooter YOBARAI Detective: Miasma Breaker – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition this fall in Japan, the developer announced.

YOBARAI Detective: Miasma Breaker first launched for Switch on January 16.

The Nintendo Switch 2 Edition will feature improved resolution and mouse support. It will be playable at the 8th National Entertainment Festival, or Zentame, which will run from October 18 to 19 in Kakamigahara, Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via our past coverage:

About

Purify the night! This is the story of the YOBARAI Detectives who work in the shadows.

Story

One night, as the city slept, evil spirits known as the “Miasma” emerged from the shadows into the empty streets, bringing disaster to the people.

The protagonist, Shinobu Kisaragi, is publicly an employee at a detective agency, but secretly, she is an agent of an organization that exterminates the Miasma.

Each, she fights the Miasma that emerge from the shadows.

What dangers await her…?

Gameplay

YOBARAI Detective: Miasma Breaker is an every-direction action shooter that emphasizes the exhilaration of defeating waves of enemy hordes.

The game uses a quest-based structure in which you clear quests, earn rewards, and use them to strengthen your characters for the next mission.

Skillfully dispose of the enemies coming at you from every direction and enjoy building up your characters.

Key Features

  • Players will be captivated by the beautiful pixel art, constructed to the finest detail, and the meticulously crafted visuals of the city at night.
  • The sounds that give life to the night city setting and battles will move the emotions of the listener.
  • The exhilaration of defeating hordes of enemies from every direction in one fell swoop is a unique feeling unlike that of any other game.
  • The promise of a wide range of character builds and the fun that comes with utilizing them.

item.title: Telenet Shooting Collection coming to PC on November 10
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Four-game collection previously released for Switch.

Edia will release Telenet Shooting Collection for PC via Steam on November 10 worldwide, the company announced.

Telenet Shooting Collection first launched for Switch on June 8, 2023 in Japan, and on September 21, 2023 worldwide.

The PC version of Telenet Shooting Collection will be released as a free launcher, with Granada, Avenger, Gaiares, and Psychic Storm available as separate downloadable content purchases for $4.99 each. Each game’s digital soundtrack will also be available as downloadable content.

Here is an overview of the collection, via Edia:

About

Telenet Shooting Collection Launcher lets players download four iconic titles, beloved by retro gaming fans, for $4.99 each:

  • Granada – A fast-paced, all-direction scrolling tank shooter. Players pilot the armored vehicle Granada, strategically fixing fire direction to overcome waves of enemies and massive bosses.
  • Avenger – A futuristic strategic helicopter shooter with mission-based branching scenarios and punishing difficulty. Pilot the cutting-edge combat chopper Avenger and reclaim the superweapon VOLOS.
  • Gaiares – An inventive shooter where players absorb enemy weapons and turn them into their own devastating arsenal. As the pilot, defend Earth against the invaders in a desperate fight for survival.
  • Psychic Storm –  A two-player cooperative shooter packed with massive bosses, unique fighter transformations, and the ultimate “Psychic Storm” attack.

Enhanced for Steam Players

While faithfully preserving the original expressions and designs of the PC Engine and Mega Drive versions, the Steam editions offer a variety of modern enhancements, including:

  • Customizable key configurations and rewind function for smoother gameplay.
  • Video filter and display settings for a tailored retro experience.
  • Full Steam Input support for a wide range of controllers.
  • Steam Achievements added to each game.

Each title will be available as individual downloadable content for $4.99 USD, playable through the Telenet Shooting Collection Launcher.
